qas.question: How many votes did Goodluck get in 2011?
What was the main opposition political party in 2011?
How many votes did Buhari get?

context: <a0_0>Goodluck Jonathan<a0_0/> served as Nigeria's president till 16 April 2011, when a new presidential election in Nigeria was conducted. Jonathan of the PDP was declared the winner on 19 April 2011, having won the election with a total of <a1_0>22,495,187<a1_0/> of the 39,469,484 votes cast, to stand ahead of <a3_0>Muhammadu Buhari<a3_0/> from the main opposition party, the <a2_0>Congress for Progressive Change<a2_0/> (CPC), which won <a4_0>12,214,853<a4_0/> of the total votes cast. The international media reported the elections as having run smoothly with relatively little violence or voter fraud, in contrast to previous elections.
